title: Client Crashes Every time I Log In (Macintosh)
body: My league of legends client keeps crashing after I log in, and I have re installed it several times but it continues to crash. I understand maybe it's cause I am using apple laptop but I hope there is a solution where I don't have to buy a new laptop

replies.body: It sounds like your game files aren't be rendered properly and causing a crash.  This could be due to game files but also settings with your Mac.  I recommend going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#section-mac) guide to get this squared away.  Make sure to select Mac in the guide for instructions specific to you OS.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards, and I'd be happy to help.
Thank you for the reply! Ill see if the guide can help me. Thank you Riot!
